name: Pop On Fluxcup #1
description:
In this piece, I play through a different medium than usual, 
I use 3D software I just learned as an instrument to represent the creative idea through several popular figures which became one of the milestones as well as a tribute to my introduction to the art world.
We all know who Vincent Van Gogh is, he is an artist (popular figure) in the fine arts. He introduces his works which are characterized by bold and dramatic colors and impulsive and expressive brush strokes (Impasto technique).
For this work, I combined the image of the Fluxcup (segmented popular character) as a canvas with several well-known figures in the art world. Vincent Van Gogh on Fluxcup, as an idea of being a surface. Where I replaced the flat canvas shape with a Fluxcup-shaped bust figure. In this work, I also cultivate the technical character of a maestro's work by imitating Vincent Van Gogh's impasto by collaborate with a painter to do this technique.

In this work, together with Anindito Wisnu, a BUMN employee and painting as his hobby. The painting is good. Very good. I like.
